Oh :( ...  I should’ve imagine that it was a mistranslation, but what exactly his post says? Anyway, glad to see you again 8TB, and thanks for translating the first part of the comic.
@Marsh248: Thanks. I was on a hiatus so I haven't been working on anything. I'll get back to working on it later this week.

@zero00heroes, DavisGod, haise01, silentherow: There's no sequel. zero00heroes confused (well Google Translate did) the wording. Kuroneko states, in the past tense, that he was working on "My Aunt sequel" or "Oba-san no Kouhen." "Kouhen" can be interpreted as "sequel." It can also be interpreted as "next part." It so happens that the name of Part 2 of this series is "Oba-san no Karada ga Kimochiyo sugiru kara Kouhen." He was listing what he done throughout the year. Sorry guys.

ELFMAN.....

@everyone: I'm taking a break from hentai for a while. There are some things that need addressing (I won't go into specifics.) I don't know how long this break will take. It may last a few days; it may last longer. Thank you to everyone who has supported the work I've done until now. As always, disregard the trolls (they're not worth it) and read the hentai which makes you happy. I'll let you guys know when there's a change in the status of this hiatus.

There have to be mods that can trim the fat off this site. It's oversaturated with 3-6 nearly identical copies of each doujin.  Either that or you guys need to make a discord. I mean come on! This copy is censored differently and has a different source but the same translation, art, and content. Why upload it?????

Again with the "hater" "troll"

Was anything I said instigating? Or meant only to illicit a negative reaction? I want to know why this was uploaded for a 5th time with only minor changes, and why don't translators communicate? You're not fooling anyone 8TB

@teamcrs: Don't go back and forth with trolls. Their only intent is to get an emotional reaction, because they themselves are emotionally disturbed. You're not their psychiatrist, and this comments section isn't an AA group. This is a hentai site; let the ones who have emotional baggage be the ones to carry it.
But nah, don't offer anything constructive to the conversation, keep kissing 8TB's ass. I'm sure that will help. Help stroke his massive ego.

Am I wrong here? This doujin, and every part of it have been uploaded multiple times. According to 8TB there is no system in place or communication between translators. 

Myself and many others hate seeing  multiple reuploads. There should be systems in place, and translation groups should coordinate and not all work on the same thing 50 times. Adding minor changes to an existing completed translation and then uploading multiple copies shouldn't be allowed. If this is the definitive "best" version of this translation then get rid of the others!

@sterob: I get what you mean. But I suppose it fits some archetype. Would it be as believable if a dominant male character didn't look the part? I don't really enjoy porn much anymore because the girls are all overly tatooed, and the setups are just corny and artificial. @Daruda: Don't worry. Barring any health issue, I plan on uploading the translated Comic in its entirety. That's the reason I made sure to add "Ongoing" and the tag "incomplete" to let you guys know that this is yet to be done.

Too many NTR turn off people because the artist keep drawing the big ugly face male in the panel. Think about porn, do you want to see the hairy ball of male actor at the climax?

@it only 399 boii: I wouldn't necessarily refer to this as Vanilla NTR. In this part, he--Kouhei--does rape her at the end. By the end of the entire series, it's pretty clear the aunt, Kyouko, has no romantic feelings toward her nephew, despite her being attracted to her sexual relationship with him. It's a bit difficult classifying this series, other than that which jumps out (incest, shotacon, etc.) because it's incredibly nuanced.
Vanilla NTR ?? was this a thing?? atleast it not some Ugly bastard NTR

@Raju29: the effect of NTR, at least as far as I'm concerned, is always nullified by the incest factor. She's cheating on her husband, but at least she isn't doing it with some overly tanned, overly pierced, blonde douchebag. That's how I see it anyway. @just me: You're right in that there's no harm in asking. But there's a reason it takes forever for those works to be translated--and that's usually because the concept art isn't that great. I worked on this because I like both the art and story. A voting system would be impossible for this site because as far as I know, the site has only comments sections as a way of communicating, and translators and translator groups choose which manga they work on. @KingSlum: No problem. Thanks for reading.

Thanks for the work man :) this is the problem with NTR, we have hot sex and milfs, but the feeling that she is a hoe betraying her husband so casually never go away (still gonna fap though) ^_^.
@8TB and @subsik, WE APPRECIATE THE HARD WORK...and well, could we hope for a translation for IRON SUGAR or URADORA MANGAN colored works? (figured its worth a shot to ask)

@villiers18: it is neither. This is part one from the comic, which was scanned from a physical book. Unlike the digital version, it doesn't have a mosaic form of censorship, but instead it's partially censored with black bars. I added subsik's translation and my revisions (I corrected parts of his translation, particularly the ad-libs made) and I translated all of the SFX. But this is for the most part subsik's translation.
this is a repost or new translation ?
